survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the effectiveness of recent employee training programs and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the recent training program you attended?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the recent training program you attended?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following training topics were most useful to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse training needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional input.

script.question_text: Which of the following training topics were most useful to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific skills or knowledge you gained from the training that you have applied in your work.
